mapper.insert: insert into interest_rate (interest_rate_serial, interest_rate_code, interest_rate_effective_time, interest_rate_expiration_time, interest_rate_type, interest_rate_base_time, interest_rate_value, interest_rate_update_time, interest_rate_update_operator) values (#{serial,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{effectiveTime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{expirationTime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{baseTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{value,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{updateOperator,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update interest_rate set interest_rate_code = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, interest_rate_effective_time = #{effectiveTime,jdbcType=DATE}, interest_rate_expiration_time = #{expirationTime,jdbcType=DATE}, interest_rate_type = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, interest_rate_base_time = #{baseTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, interest_rate_value = #{value,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, interest_rate_update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=DATE}, interest_rate_update_operator = #{updateOperator,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where interest_rate_serial = #{serial,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select interest_rate_serial, interest_rate_code, interest_rate_effective_time, interest_rate_expiration_time, interest_rate_type, interest_rate_base_time, interest_rate_value, interest_rate_update_time, interest_rate_update_operator from interest_rate where interest_rate_serial = #{serial,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select interest_rate_serial, interest_rate_code, interest_rate_effective_time, interest_rate_expiration_time, interest_rate_type, interest_rate_base_time, interest_rate_value, interest_rate_update_time, interest_rate_update_operator from interest_rate where interest_rate_code = #{code} and #{time} < interest_rate_expiration_time and #{time} >= interest_rate_effective_time;
